name: Chihiro
descripition: Referred throughout most of the film by her nickname Sen, Chihiro is a shy, pessimistic, 10-year-old girl. During her adventure in the Spirit World, she matures from an easily-scared girl with a child-like personality to match her age to a hard-working, responsible, and brave young girl.

name: Sheeta
descripition: Sheeta, whose full name is Lusheeta Toel Ul Laputa, is a 13-year-old orphaned farm girl. Her glowing stone keeps Laputa alive.

name: San
descripition: San, otherwise known as Princess Mononoke or the "Wolf Girl," is the main character, along with Ashitaka, She acts, behaves, and resembles a wolf due to the fact that she was raised by wolves themselves.

name: Sophie
descripition: Sophie Hatter is the main character in Studio Ghibli's film Howl's Moving Castle. She runs a hat shop in her town along with her sisters and mother. When the Witch of the Waste curses her with a spell that turns her into a ninety-year old woman, Sophie goes to the Waste in search of a cure.
